short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color words based on their emotional valence.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Text Valence Colorizer alters the HTML on webpages to make ~50 words with a positive valence such as love, joy, peace the color green. It makes ~50 words with a negative valence such as don't, fail, fear the color red.
